World

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • World.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains information about all the tiles and characters in a specific map and load them when the map is used
    Version:
    2013-02-11
    Author:
    Johan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map()
      Creates an empty map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map()
        Creates an empty map. Use the loadMap method to insert tiles.

      • getMap

        public java.lang.String getMap(java.lang.String direction)
        Returns the mapID in the specified direction. If no map exists, returns null.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to check
        Returns:
        MapID The ID of the map connected

      • readBackTiles

        public void readBackTiles(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the BackTiles. Breaks when it reads "[BLOCKTILES]".
        Parameters:
        reader - The stream to read from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readBlockTiles

        public void readBlockTiles(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the blockTiles. Ends when it reads EOF.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
